basics.name: Karel Léorier
basics.label: Senior Fullstack Web Developer
basics.summary: Hi ! I'm Karel, 20+ years of experience in Web development for big companies. I'm a friendly guy ☺️, Javascript / NodeJS specialist. Available from France as a Freelance and Full-remote jobs.

work.name: Pôle Emploi (Accenture contractor)
work.summary: LOT 5 was a progressive maintenance of Statistics and BI application.
highlights: Tech lead on 5 five projects with 3 technologies : BI (SAS, Datastage), Java, Big systems (Cobol, GCOS 8, Pacbase)
2 years call for tenders won at the end of the first period

work.name: Directions des Douanes (Accenture contractor)
work.summary: GAMMA was a european coordinated project for dematerialization of a paper-based procedure for handling alcohol, cigarettes and petrol taxes.
highlights: Java/J2EE architecture, SOA oriented (XML) / Enterprise Service Bus
Project on-time & budget, and successfully deployed for France

work.name: AXA Netherlands (Accenture contractor)
work.summary: Progressive maintenance of a Java/J2EE web application for life insurance management.

work.name: Crédit du Nord (Accenture contractor)
work.summary: CHOPIN was a multi-year program for developing internal clientele management (both personal and professional) used by all the bank's employees.
highlights: Java/J2EE architecture, frontend JSP, Javascript & HTML
Other tools : Dreamweaver, Eclipse, WebLogic, ClearCase
